systems

Class SimpleSystem<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • systems.SimpleSystem<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - object that will be work with in system
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountSystem, BookSystem, RequestSystem

    public abstract class SimpleSystem<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Basic system in library that can do basic things of a system
